functions.name: Align
functions.desc: Align sequencing reads to long reference sequences using bowtie2 algorithm.
functions.example: data = bowtie2.Align(ref, data, data2='') #if data2 is empty single read; otherwise pair-read

params.name: data
params.desc: If it is a folder name, all .fastq and .fq files are recursively collected from that folder.

params.name: data2
params.desc: Reverse seq for pair-end read. If it is a folder, all .fastq and .fq files are recursively collected.
